snippet.title: Agatha Knife - Launch Trailer (Nintendo Switch | Xbox One | PlayStation 4 | Steam)
snippet.description:
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/agatha-knife-switch
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/store/p/agatha-knife/c4bvwl544q89
PlayStation 4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP5482-CUSA16212_00-0000000000000000
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/618950/Agatha_Knife/

Embark on a satircially humorous narrative adventure with naive seven-year-old Agatha, who's struggling between her work in a butcher shop and her unwavering love for meat. Aiming to make the animals unafraid of their inevitable fate, you'll head into the whimsical Psychotic Universe looking for answers. Join Agatha as she undertakes the challenge of creating a new religion of her own, Carnivorism, and works to convince the animals that the sacrifice of their flesh is the secret to eternal happiness.

Learn more about Agatha Knife:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MangoProtocol
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mangoprotocol/
Website: http://www.mangoprotocol.com
